INSERT ALL
INTO SCRAP_CARD ( SC_CARD_NO, SC_CARD_URL, SC_CARD_SLOGAN, SC_CARD_NAME, SC_ANNUAL_FEE, SC_S_SERVICE, SC_DATE ) VALUES ( SCRAP_CARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{card.scCardUrl}, #{card.scCardSlogan}, #{card.scCardName}, #{card.scAnnualFee}, #{card.scSService}, SYSDATE )
